channel.title: markdown on Dawn's website
channel.description: Recent content in markdown on Dawn's website

item.title: Vacation is approaching
item.description: The vacation is approaching Mayday holiday is coming we hang out for fun with friends. On this day, I went to Chengdu Huanlegu with Irene,my best friend,and have so much fun here.But she always chatted with her bf, so that I was more than happy.

item.title: Vacation is at an end
item.description: SO SO SAD I still remember the happyniess in theamusement park . I am fond to drive bumper carswhich can bring me excitement and pleasure.
